text: allāhuve sambandhicca bhaktiyinmēluṁ avanṟe prītiyinmēluṁ tanṟe keṭṭiṭaṁ sthāpiccavanēā atalla, peāḷiññuvīḻān pēākunna oru maṇaltiṭṭayuṭe vakkatt keṭṭiṭaṁ sthāpikkukayuṁ enniṭṭat tanneyuṁ keāṇṭ narakāgniyil peāḷiññuvīḻukayuṁ ceytavanēā kūṭutal uttaman? akramikaḷāya janaṅṅaḷe allāhu nērvaḻiyilākkukayilla
